task.Question: Of the authors (First M. Last) that worked on the paper "Pie Menus or Linear Menus, Which Is Better?" in 2015, what was the title of the first paper authored by the one that had authored prior papers?
task.Final answer: Mapping Human Oriented Information to Software Agents for Online Systems Usage

Annotator Metadata.Steps:
1. Searched "Pie Menus or Linear Menus, Which Is Better?" on Google.
2. Opened "Pie Menus or Linear Menus, Which Is Better?" on https://oda.oslomet.no/oda-xmlui/handle/10642/3162.
3. Clicked each author's name.
4. Noted the name that had no other papers listed.
5. Searched "Murano, Pietro" on Google.
6. Opened http://www.pietromurano.org/.
7. Clicked "Publications".
8. Found the earliest paper he contributed to.

steps.text:
Title: Pietro Murano - Publications
=======================
Pietro Murano
=============

Publications
============

* [Home](http://pietromurano.org/index.html)
* [Research](http://pietromurano.org/research.html)
* [Lecturing](http://pietromurano.org/lecturing.html)
* [Administration](http://pietromurano.org/administration.html)
* [Popular Media](http://pietromurano.org/popular_media.html)
* [Contact](http://pietromurano.org/contact.html)

This section lists all my publications and where possible the publications are included. Click on a title to read a paper.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

INTERNATIONAL REFEREED JOURNAL PAPERS
-------------------------------------

Al\-Jasim, Alyaa \& Murano, Pietro (2023\) [Designing User Interface Toggles for Usability \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/JUX_Al-Jasim_Murano_Aug_2023_PUBLISHED_VERSION.pdf), Journal of User Experience, Volume 18, Issue 4, August 2023\.

Shrestha, Sayush Lal \& Murano, Pietro (2022\) [The Design and Evaluation of an Online Dictionary User
Interface \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/Online Dictionary User Interface - Shrestha-Murano PUBLISHED VERSION.pdf), International Journal of Computing and Digital Systems, Volume 1, March 2022\.

Keya, Rashika Tasnim \& Murano, Pietro (2022\) [Is Carousel Interaction Really Usable? \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/Keya Murano PUBLISHED VERSION.pdf), First Monday, Volume 27, Issue 1, January 2022\.

Chaudhary, Karan Singh \& Murano, Pietro (2021\)  [The Design and Evaluation of a New Smartwatch User Interface\- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/Chaudhary Murano Published Version.pdf), International Journal of Interactive Mobile Technologies (iJIM), Vol. 15, Issue 13, 2021\.

Awale, Bikram \& Murano, Pietro (2020\)  [A Preliminary Usability and Universal Design Evaluation of a Television App User Interface \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/Awale Murano PUBLISHED Version.pdf), Baltic Journal of Modern Computing, Vol. 8, Issue 3, 2020\.

Sharma, Sushil \& Murano, Pietro (2020\)  [A Usability Evaluation of Web User Interface Scrolling Types \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/Sharma-Murano-Paper - Final Version.pdf), First Monday, Vol. 25, Issue 3, February 2020\.

Suru, Hassan Umar \& Murano, Pietro (2019\)  [Security and User Interface Usability of Graphical Authentication Systems A Review
 \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/Published Version Murano Suru.pdf), International Journal of Computer Trends and Technology, Vol. 67, Issue 2, February, p.17\-36\.

Murano, Pietro \& Ali, Rao Muhammad Danial (2018\)  [A Preliminary Investigation into the Usability of Force Touch Interaction in a Mobile Context
 \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/Force-Touch-Mobile-Context-Murano-Ali-Published-Version.pdf), International Journal of Interactive Mobile Technologies, Vol. 12, Issue 5, p.169\-181\.

Shrestha, Suraj \& Murano, Pietro (2018\)  [An Algorithm For Automatically
Detecting Dyslexia On The Fly
 \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/Algorithm-Detect-Dyslexia-on-Fly-Shrestha-Murano-Published-Version.pdf), International Journal of Computer Science \& Information Technology, Vol. 10, Issue 3, p.1\-18, (c) AIRCC Publishing Corporation.

Murano, Pietro (2018\)  [A New User Interface for a Text Proofreading Web Portal in a Digitization
and Crowdsourcing Context
 \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/Crowdsourcing-Paper-FINAL-Web.pdf), International Journal of Web Information Systems, Vol. 14, Issue 1, p.107\-122\.

Shrestha, Suraj \& Murano, Pietro (2016\)  [A Universally Designed and Usable Data Visualization for A Mobile Application in the Context of Rheumatoid Arthritis
 \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/A_Universally_Designed_and_Usable_Data_Visualization-PUBLISHED VERSION.pdf), International Journal of Advanced Computer Science and Applications, Vol. 7, Issue 12, December 2016\.

Murano, Pietro \& Sander, Margrete (2016\)  [User Interface Menu Design Performance and User Preferences: A Review and Ways Forward \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/Published_Version_User_Interface_Menu_Design_Performance_and_User_Preferences_Murano_Sander.pdf), International Journal of Advanced Computer Science and Applications, Vol. 7, Issue 4, April 2016\.

Murano, Pietro \& Khan, Iram N. (2015\)  [Pie Menus or Linear Menus, Which Is Better? \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/Murano-Khan-Published-Version.pdf), Journal of Emerging Trends in Computing and Information Sciences, Vol. 6, Issue 9, September 2015\.

Murano, Pietro \& Lomas, Tracey J. (2015\)  [Menu Positioning on Web Pages. Does it Matter? \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/IJACSA-Murano-Lomas-Published-Version.pdf), International Journal of Advanced Computer Science and Applications, Vol. 6, Issue 4, April 2015\.

Travis, Charlotte \& Murano, Pietro (2014\) A Comparative Study of the Usability of Touch\-Based and Mouse\-Based Interaction, International Journal of Pervasive Computing and Communications, Vol. 10, Issue 1\. PAPER RECEIVED AN EMERALD HIGHLY COMMENDED AWARD 2015

Murano, Pietro \& Oenga, Kennedy K. (2012\)  [The Impact on Effectiveness and User Satisfaction of Menu Positioning on Web Pages \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/IJACSA-Murano-Oenga-Journal-Final.pdf), International Journal of Advanced Computer Science and Applications, Vol. 3, Issue 9, September 2012\.

Murano, Pietro, Gee, Anthony \& Holt, Patrik O'Brian (2011\) [Evaluation of an Anthropomorphic User Interface in a Travel Reservation Context and Affordances \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/JoC-Murano-Holt-Gee-Anthro-TravelRes.pdf), Journal of Computing, Volume 3, Issue 8, August 2011\.

Murano, Pietro \& Holt, Patrik O'Brian (2011\) [Evaluation of Human\-Like Anthropomorphism in the Context of Online Bidding and Affordances \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/JoC-Murano-Holt-Anthro-Bidding-Affordances-Final.pdf), Journal of Computing, Vol 3, Issue 6, June 2011\.

Murano, Pietro \& Sethi, Tanvi (2011\)  [Anthropomorphic User Interface Feedback in a Sewing Context and Affordances \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/IJACSA-Murano-Sethi-Sewing-Affordances.pdf), International Journal of Advanced Computer Science and Applications, Vol 2, Issue 4, April 2011\.

Murano, Pietro \& Holt, Patrik O'Brian (2011\)  [Evaluation of Anthropomorphic Feedback for an Online Auction and Affordances \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/Murano-IJCSI-Final.pdf), International Journal of Computer Science Issues, Vol 8, Issue 2, March 2011\.

Murano, Pietro \& Holt, Patrik O'Brian (2007\) Anthropomorphic Feedback In User Interfaces: The Effect of Personality Traits, Context and Grice's Maxims on Effectiveness and Preferences. International Journal of Technology and Human Interaction, Vol 3, Issue 4, p. 52\-63\. \- IDEA Group Inc.

Murano, Pietro \& Mackey, Dino (2007\) Usefulness of VRML Building Models in a Direction Finding Context. Interacting With Computers \- Elsevier .

BOOK CHAPTERS
-------------

Szentirmai, Attila Bekkvik \& Murano, Pietro (2023\)  [New Universal Design Heuristics for Mobile Augmented Reality Applications \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/Published Version Szentirmai Murano 2023.pdf), HCI International 2023 – Late Breaking Papers, 25th International Conference on Human\-Computer Interaction, HCII 2023, Copenhagen, Denmark, July 23–28, 2023
 Proceedings, Part II Springer LNCS 14055, Eds. Gao, Qin; Zhou, Jia; Duffy, Vincent G.; Antona, Margherita; Stephanidis, Constantine.

Murano, Pietro, Holt, Patrik O'Brian (2009\) Anthropomorphic Feedback In User Interfaces: The Effect of Personality Traits, Context and Grice's Maxims on Effectiveness and Preferences, In Cross\-Disciplinary Advances in Human Computer Interaction, User Modeling, Social Computing and Adaptive Interfaces, Eds. Zaphiris, Panayiotis \& Ang, Chee Siang, IGI Global.

Murano, Pietro (2006\) Why Anthropomorphic User Interface Feedback can be Effective and Preferred by Users, In Enterprise Information Systems 7, Eds. Chen, Chin\-Sheng, Filipe, Joaquim, Seruca, Isabel and Cordeiro, Jose, (c) Springer.

INTERNATIONAL REFEREED PAPERS
-----------------------------

Murano, Pietro \& Kongshaug, Petter (2024\)  [The Usability of Persistent and Non\-Persistent Headers on Web Pages \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/Murano Kongshaug Web Page Headers.pdf), Proceedings of the 26th International Conference on Enterprise Information Systems (ICEIS 2024\), April 28\-30, 2024, Angers \- France (c) \- INSTICC, SciTePress.

Munir, Mubashar \& Murano, Pietro (2023\)  [The Usability of Hidden Functional Elements in Mobile User Interfaces \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/Munir-Murano-Hidden-Elements-Published-Version.pdf), Proceedings of the 25th International Conference on Enterprise Information Systems (ICEIS 2023\), April 24\-26, 2023, Prague \- Czech Republic (c) \- INSTICC, SciTePress.

Ferati, Mexhid, Murano, Pietro \& Giannoumis, G. Anthony (2017\)  [Universal Design of User Interfaces in Self\-driving Cars \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/Ferati_Murano_Giannoumis_web.pdf), Proceedings of the AHFE 2017 International Conference on Design for Inclusion, July 17\-21, 2017, The Westin Bonaventure Hotel, Los Angeles, California, USA (c) \- Springer.

Murano, Pietro \& Holt, Patrik O'Brian (2010\)  [Evaluation of an Anthropomorphic User Interface in a Telephone Bidding Context and Affordances \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/Murano-Voices-Bidding-Final.pdf), 12th International Conference on Enterprise Information Systems, Madeira, Portugal, 8\-12 June. (c) \- INSTICC. In Cooperation With ACM SIGCHI

Murano, Pietro \& Tuah, Nooralisa Mohd (2010\)  [Effectiveness and Preferences of Anthropomorphic Feedback in a Statistics Context \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/Murano-Tuah-Anthro-Statistics.pdf), 12th International Conference on Enterprise Information Systems, Madeira, Portugal, 8\-12 June. (c) \- INSTICC. In Cooperation With ACM SIGCHI

Murano, Pietro, Malik, Amir \& Holt, Patrik O'Brian (2009\) [Evaluation of Anthropomorphic User Interface Feedback in an Email Client Context and Affordances \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/ICEIS-Milan-Final.pdf), 11th International Conference on Enterprise Information Systems, Milan, Italy, 6\-10 May. (c) \- INSTICC.

Murano, Pietro, Ede, Christopher \& Holt, Patrik O'Brian (2008\) [Effectiveness and Preferences of Anthropomorphic User Interface Feedback in a PC Building Context and Cognitive Load \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/ICEIS-BarcelonaV2.pdf), 10th International Conference on Enterprise Information Systems, Barcelona, Spain, 12\-16 June 2008\. (c) \- INSTICC.

Murano, Pietro, Gee, Anthony \& Holt, Patrik O'Brian (2007\) [Anthropomorphic Vs Non\-Anthropomorphic User Interface Feedback for Online Hotel Bookings \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/PM-iceis-Portugal-Final.pdf), 9th International Conference on Enterprise Information Systems, Funchal, Madeira, Portugal, 12\-16 June 2007\. (c) \- INSTICC.

Murano, Pietro \& Mackey, Dino (2005\) [Effectiveness of VRML Building Models for Direction Finding \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/HCI-2005-LasVegas-paper.pdf), HCI International 2005 \- 11th International Conference on Human\-Computer Interaction, Las Vegas, USA, 22\-27 July 2005

Murano, Pietro (2005\) [Why Anthropomorphic User Interface Feedback Can be Effective and Preferred by Users \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/ICEIS-Miami-2005.pdf), 7th International Conference on Enterprise Information Systems, Miami, USA, 25\-28 May 2005\. (c) \- INSTICC \- RECEIVED A BEST PAPER AWARD\-PUBLISHED AS BOOK CHAPTER by Springer.

Murano, Pietro (2003\) [Anthropomorphic Vs Non\-Anthropomorphic Software Interface Feedback for Online Factual Delivery \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/IV-LondonV2.pdf), 7th International Conference on Information Visualisation (IV 2003\) An International Conference on Computer Visualisation and Graphics Applications, London, England, 16\-18 July 2003, (c) \- IEEE.

Murano, Pietro (2002\) [Anthropomorphic Vs Non\-Anthropomorphic Software Interface Feedback for Online Systems Usage \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/parisV2-1.pdf), 7th European Research Consortium for Informatics and Mathematics (ERCIM) Workshop \- 'User Interfaces for All' \- Special Theme: 'Universal Access'.Paris(Chantilly),France 24,25 October 2002\. Published in Lecture Notes in Computer Science (C) \- Springer.

Murano, Pietro (2002\) [Effectiveness of Mapping Human\-Oriented Information to Feedback From a Software Interface \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/EFL.pdf), Proceedings of the 24th International Conference on Information Technology Interfaces, Cavtat, Croatia, 24\-27 June 2002\.

Murano, Pietro (2001\) [A New Software Agent 'Learning' Algorithm \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/Agent-Algorithm-2001.pdf), People in Control An International Conference on Human Interfaces in Control Rooms, Cockpits and Command Centres, UMIST, UK, IEE.

Murano, Pietro (2001\) [Mapping Human\-Oriented Information to Software Agents for Online Systems Usage \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/Systems-Usage-2001.pdf) People in Control An International Conference on Human Interfaces in Control Rooms, Cockpits and Command Centres, UMIST, UK, IEE.

INTERNATIONAL PRESENTATIONS
---------------------------

Ritchings, Tim. Papoulakis, George. Garvey, David. Murano, Pietro. Sheta, Walaa. (2003\) [Augmenting Environments By Automated Sign Location and Text Detection \- PDF](http://pietromurano.org/Papers/HCII2003.pdf) HCI International 2003, 10th International Conference on Human Computer Interaction \- Symposium on Human Interface (Japan) 2003 \- 5th International Conference on Engineering Psychology and Cognitive Ergonomics \- 2nd International Conference on Universal Access in Human Computer Interaction. 22\-27 June 2003, Crete, Greece.

Effectiveness of Mapping Human\-Oriented Information to Software Agents for Online Teaching Environments Womens Engineering Society (WES) 73rd Annual Conference \- Human Interface With Machines. UCLAN,UK, September 2000\.

(C) Pietro Murano (applies to entire site content) All rights reserved.

steps.reasoning: The first paper authored by Pietro Murano before 2015 is titled "Anthropomorphic Vs Non-Anthropomorphic Software Interface Feedback for Online Factual Delivery" published in 2003.
